targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

targets.expr: sum(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$cluster_name", container!="istio-proxy", container=~"^[[:alpha:]]*"}[$interval])) by (namespace) / (sum(container_spec_cpu_shares{namespace="$cluster_name", container!="istio-proxy", container=~"^[[:alpha:]]*"}) by(namespace) / 1024)

(sum(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$cluster_name", container!="istio-proxy", container=~"^[[:alpha:]]*"}[$interval])) by (namespace))/ (sum(container_spec_cpu_quota{namespace="$cluster_name", container!="istio-proxy", container=~"^[[:alpha:]]*"}) by (namespace) / 100 / 1024)

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

targets.expr: sum by(pod)(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$cluster_name", container=~"$service_name"}[$interval])) / on (pod) group_left  sum by(pod)(container_spec_cpu_shares{namespace="$cluster_name", container=~"$service_name"} / 1024 )

sum by(pod)(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$cluster_name", container=~"$service_name"}[$interval])) / on (pod) group_left sum by(pod)(container_spec_cpu_quota{namespace="$cluster_name", container=~"$service_name"} / 100 / 1024 )

sum by(pod)(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$cluster_name", container="istio-proxy", pod=~"$service_name.*"}[$interval])) / on (pod) group_left sum by(pod)(container_spec_cpu_quota{namespace="$cluster_name", container="istio-proxy",pod=~"$service_name.*"} / 100 / 1024)

sum by(namespace)(container_memory_rss{namespace="$cluster_name", container!="istio-proxy", container=~"^[[:alpha:]]*"}) / sum by(namespace)(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{namespace="$cluster_name", container!="istio-proxy", container=~"^[[:alpha:]]*"})
